name: Introduction to Cultural Studies
description: An introduction to the interdisciplinary field of cultural studies, which looks at how the media, language, and other aspects of culture shape and are shaped by society.

name: Globalization and Cultural Change
description: Explores how globalization has changed the way culture is understood and experienced, both nationally and globally.

name: Cultural Globalization and Development
description: Explores how globalization and development interact and shape each other as well as the economic, political, and social aspects of various cultures.

name: Advanced Globalization Studies
description: Explores the history, theory, and practice of globalization, including its economic, political, and cultural effects.
